description: This Teriyaki Tofu Stir Fry is made with just 5 ingredients and is perfectly for an easy weeknight dinner!
name: Teriyaki Tofu Stir Fry - 5 Ingredient Trader Joe's Series
recipeIngredient: 1 (16 oz) package high protein extra firm tofu (Trader Joe’s Brand)
1 (18 oz) package asian style vegetable stir fry mix (Trader Joe’s Brand)
1 (21 oz) bottle Soyaki Sauce (Trader Joe’s Brand)
Organic Jasmine Rice microwave packets (about 1/2 per person) (Trader Joe’s Brand)

recipeInstructions.text: Drain tofu and pat dry. Dice tofu into bite size pieces. Heat a large pan over medium heat and add 1-2 teaspoons olive oil and the tofu. Stir and cook tofu until browned on all sides, 7-10 minutes.

Add in the stir fry veggie mix and 1/2 – 1 cup Soyaki sauce. You want to add enough so that the vegetables and tofu can simmer in the sauce. Cover pan and cook until veggies are softened, 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Cook rice in the microwave according to package directions and spoon about 1/2 – 3/4 cup of rice into each bowl. Top with a big spoonful of the rice and veggie mixture and top with sliced green onions.
